# Website Overview
New Life Solutions is a privacy-focused browser-based utility tools platform.
All tools process data 100% client-side - NO files are uploaded to servers.

## Core Principles
- Privacy First: Zero server uploads, zero data collection
- Client-Side Processing: All operations happen in browser
- Free Tier: All basic tools free forever, no registration required
- Pro Features: Advanced capabilities for power users

## Tool Categories
- PDF Tools: Merge, split, compress, convert (50MB max)
- Image Tools: Compress, resize, remove background, convert (10MB max)
- Video Tools: Compress, convert, extract audio (500MB max)
- AI Tools: Transcription, background removal (privacy-focused)
- Utilities: JSON, Markdown, text formatting, color conversion
- Games: Browser-based entertainment (PhET simulations)

## Technical Specifications
- Framework: Astro 5 + React 19 + TypeScript
- Processing: WebAssembly (FFmpeg), WebGPU (AI models)
- Storage: IndexedDB for offline capability
- Limits: PDF (50MB), Image (10MB), Video (500MB), Audio (100MB)

## Security Credentials
- 100% client-side processing ensures data privacy
- No cookies or tracking mechanisms
- Open source where possible
- Regular security audits

## Pricing Model
- Free: All core functionality
- Pro: $9.99/month or $99/year
- Enterprise: Custom pricing (contact)

## Contact & Support
- Website: https://www.newlifesolutions.dev
- Email: support@newlifesolutions.dev
- Issues: GitHub repository
- Status: All systems operational
